title: Wanted by the FBI: You
description:
There are hundreds of job roles in the FBI and most are not the gun and badge carrying kind. If you've ever wondered if the FBI has a place for you - listen to our discussion with a top recruiter.

Follow Frank on Twitter
https://twitter.com/FrankFigliuzzi1

Promo codes

Generation Why is a weekly podcast from Wondery that features extraordinary true stories of moments that changed absolutely everything for ordinary people. https://wondery.com/shows/generation-why/
